featured.text: And you’re a bioethicist and one of the architects of Obamacare.

definition.zh_def: 生物倫理學家：專門研究生物醫學和生命科學中倫理問題的專家。
definition.en_def: A bioethicist is an expert who studies ethical issues arising from advances in biology and medicine.
definition.example: The bioethicist provided guidance on the ethical implications of genetic testing.
